entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023
